Package org.grapheditor.editor.menus

The package contains menus used by the GraphEditorPane component.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ColorSelectedListener An listener interface that can be added to ColorChooserMenuItemGroup to listen for color selections.
 

Class Summary
ColorChooserMenuItemGroup This class represents a group of Menu items.
NothingSelectedMenu This menu is showed when the user right click in the graph pane and nothing is selected.
OnlyEdgesSelectedMenu This menu is displayed when only edges is selected.
OperationsMenu This menu shows menu items to perform all avable operations on the graph.
SelectedVertexColorMenu This menu is used to select the certex color.
SelectionMenu This menu is used for som selection commands.
ShapeSelectionMenu This menu is used to select the vertex shape of selected vertices.
VertexSelectedMenu This menu is displayed when vertices is selected in the graph.
 

Package org.grapheditor.editor.menus Description

The package contains menus used by the GraphEditorPane component. The menus are showed when the user right click somewhere in the graph window. Depending on which vertices and edges that are clicked different menus is showed.
